bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: Robert Henry Glass was the father of Carter Glass, a U.S. Senator from Lynchburg, Va. Robert Henry Glass purchased the Lynchburg Daily Republican in 1858.

scopecontent.head: Collection Overview
